thread.title: Cuomo signs memo committing to emissions cuts
thread.title_full: Cuomo signs memo committing to emissions cuts - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Cuomo signs memo committing to emissions cuts
text: Flanked by former Vice President Al Gore, Gov. Andrew Cuomo on Thursday signed a memorandum of understanding committing New York to an international, multi-government effort to limit global warming to less than 2 degrees Celsius. Cuomo became the third state governor to sign the “Under 2 MOU,” which has garnered signatures from more than 40 [...] The post Cuomo signs memo committing to emissions cuts appeared first on Politics on the Hudson.
